overview_metadata.overview_subtitle: Translations of Figures on the Coordinate Plane
overview_metadata.overview_description: In this lesson, students use patty paper to explore translations of various figures on a coordinate plane. They then generalize the effects that translating a figure has on its coordinates. Students verify that two figures are congruent by describing a sequence of translations that map one figure onto another.

overview_item_data_items: I can identify congruent figures by obtaining one figure from another using a sequence of translations.
I can translate geometric figures on the coordinate plane.
I can use coordinates to describe the effect of translating a two-dimensional figure.
A translation is a transformation that moves each point of a figure the same distance and direction.

A point with the coordinates <math><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>, when translated horizontally by <math><mi>c</mi></math> units, has new coordinates <math><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>. A point with the coordinates <math><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>, when translated vertically by <math><mi>c</mi></math> units, has new coordinates <math><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students solve a corridor maze and describe the steps they used.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Modeling Translations on the Coordinate Plane
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio:
Students explore and make a conjecture about a translation's effect on any point <math><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>.
Material: Patty paper

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Translating Any Point on the Coordinate Plane
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students perform translations of a single point and record the coordinates of the translated points.
Students demonstrate that two figures are congruent when the same sequence of translations maps one figure onto the other.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Left and Right, Up and Down
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students generalize how a translation affects an ordered pair <math><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>.
